thread.title: Ralph Nader's American Museum of Tort Law looks to expand in Winsted | Republican-American
thread.title_full: Ralph Nader's American Museum of Tort Law looks to expand in Winsted | Republican-American

author: theatlantic.com
title: Ralph Nader's American Museum of Tort Law looks to expand in Winsted | Republican-American
text:
BY KURT MOFFETT | REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN December 26, 2024 13 0 Facebook Twitter Pinterest WhatsApp Email Print The American Museum of Tort Law at 654 Main St. in Winsted is mulling an addition that would provide space for a mock courtroom and a citizens hall of fame. Kurt Moffett Republican-American WINSTED – The American Museum of Tort Law is looking to expand. The proposed addition to the museum at 654 Main St. – founded in 2015 by town native, longtime…
